memories.info: Living in parents' basement in Ohio.
Relationship status: Single. Recently broke up with Jessica.
Terrified of dogs due to a childhood incident.
Goal: Wants to work as a graphic designer.

diaries.diary: Finally made it to Chicago! The apartment on 42nd Street is smaller than I thought, but it's mine. The moving truck broke down twice. I'm sleeping on the floor tonight.
First day at the new design agency, 'Pixel & Ink'. My boss, Karen, seems strict. I felt like an imposter during the morning meeting.
Met a neighbor, Alex, in the elevator. He has a golden retriever named 'Buster'. I almost panicked, but the dog just licked my hand. Alex asked if I wanted to grab coffee sometime.
Coffee with Alex turned into dinner. We talked for 4 hours. I forgot to mention, I actually petted Buster today! I think my fear is fading.
Woke up feeling ready. Karen approved my logo drafts yesterday! And I have a second date with Alex on Friday. Life in Chicago is starting to feel real.
